title: Website for fine art exhibition
content:
Hello typophiles,

this is my first critique request so please be kind, not!

[here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420023407/http:/www.tezzutezzu.com/blog/websites/fleet-exhibition-website) is the info about the site,  
and [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420023407/http:/www.fleetexhibition.info/) the site itself

Go ahead and tell me what you think about it!

thank you!
author: tezzutezzu

comments.content:
Hi tezzutezzu.

I think it looks very good. How come they don't pay you?

In the artist list the lower part is outside my viewport and there is no way to scroll down. I'm on a rather small screen (1024 by 768 px).

Also the scrollbar attacted to your content movie clip doesn't seem to work properly. You can scroll kinda far beyond the images.

Thanks for the reply Frank!

"In the artist list the lower part is outside my viewport and there is no way to scroll down. I’m on a rather small screen (1024 by 768 px)."

Ooops! It's an old bug I fixed in the previous version. I'm going to fix it asap.

"Also the scrollbar attacted to your content movie clip doesn’t seem to work properly. You can scroll kinda far beyond the images."

Hm. that's unexpected. Can you be more specific? Where does this happen? thanks!
